meta.title: Jesus Near – Find Christ Closer
meta.description: Jesus Near is a multilingual Christian resource to help you grow in faith, prayer, and understanding of the Gospel.
meta.ogDescription: Multilingual Christian articles and resources to deepen your walk with Jesus Christ.

jesus.metaTitle: Who Is Jesus Christ? Teachings, Life, and Relationship
jesus.metaDescription: Discover the identity, teachings, miracles, and parables of Jesus Christ. Learn how to build a personal relationship with Him and explore His life and legacy.
jesus.title: Jesus Christ
jesus.explore: Explore the person and teachings of Jesus
jesus.description: Explore the life and message of Jesus Christ—His identity, miracles, teachings, and parables. Learn how His life shapes our faith and how we can grow in relationship with Him today.
jesus.imageAlt: Jesus Christ depicted teaching the crowd

bible.metaTitle: Bible Study & Interpretation – Old and New Testament
bible.metaDescription: Understand the structure and message of the Bible. Study the Old and New Testaments, explore key biblical figures, and uncover the meaning behind Christian symbols.
bible.title: Bible
bible.explore: Explore the books and message of the Bible
bible.description: Dive into the Bible’s rich narrative—from Genesis to Revelation. Explore major biblical themes, characters, and how the Word of God speaks to us today through study and interpretation.
bible.imageAlt: Open Bible with sunlight shining on its pages

prayer.metaTitle: Prayer and Spiritual Growth – A Christian Guide
prayer.metaDescription: Grow your spiritual life through prayer, fasting, and inner healing. Learn how to develop a daily prayer habit and deepen your relationship with God.
prayer.title: Prayer & Spirituality
prayer.explore: Deepen your prayer and spiritual growth
prayer.description: Strengthen your spiritual journey through prayer, meditation, solitude, and inner healing. Discover practical guidance to grow closer to God each day.
prayer.imageAlt: Hands folded in prayer in soft candlelight

faith-in-life.metaTitle: Living Your Faith Daily – Family, Work, and Challenges
faith-in-life.metaDescription: Apply your faith to everyday life—family, work, finances, and trials. Find wisdom and strength to live as a Christian in every area of life.
faith-in-life.title: Faith in Daily Life
faith-in-life.explore: Live your faith in everyday life
faith-in-life.description: Faith is not just for Sundays. Discover how to live out your beliefs in daily life—from work and money to family and hardships—with Christian discipline and trust in God.
faith-in-life.imageAlt: Person walking down a path with sunrise ahead, symbolizing daily faith

relationships.metaTitle: Christian Relationships – Marriage, Parenting, and Friendship
relationships.metaDescription: Explore Christian principles for healthy relationships—marriage, parenting, forgiveness, and community. Learn how to love and serve others with Christ-like compassion.
relationships.title: Relationships
relationships.description: Relationships are central to Christian living. Grow in love, forgiveness, and community through biblical guidance for marriage, parenting, and friendships.
relationships.imageAlt: Two people holding hands in a warm, supportive moment
